rationale: Assessed as Data Deficient due to the lack of information regarding this species exact distribution, habitat, ecology or current status. There are a number of threats to eastern Borneo, but without further data, the extent to which C. nigriloba is threatened cannot be determined.
assessor: Jenkins, A., Kullander, F.F. & Tan, H.H.
evaluator: Collen, B., Darwall, W., Ram, M. & Smith, K. (SRLI Freshwater Fish Evaluation Workshop)
